abstract: Since his appointment in 2006, the executive oversaw a period of growth for the company, as well as increased sales pressure from BMW and Audi.
snippet: Since his appointment in 2006, the executive oversaw a period of growth for the company, as well as increased sales pressure from BMW and Audi.
lead_paragraph: Daimler, the parent of Mercedes-Benz, has dismissed Ernst Lieb, the president and chief executive of the luxury automaker's American subsidiary.

headline.main: Mercedes Fires U.S. Chief and Cancels Dealer Meeting
